title: mOhana muraLiyAl
sahitya:
mOhana muraLiyAl dAham taNindiDavE mundu vandEn kaNNA


anupallavi

  dEha brndAvanattil dEhiyAi viLanguvAi jIva rAdhai vAzhum AviyE Om hari


caraNam    kaNDunnaik-kaN kuLirak-koNDu kai malarai vaNDun maduvenavE uNDun amudarasam
paNDu vinai aghala viNDun idaya sukham enrum rAdhAnandanAi inbuTr-irundiDavE
